title: New Cars
content: We've just added a range of exciting new cars to our rental fleet! From sleek sedans to powerful SUVs, there's something for every journey. Browse our updated selection now and experience the comfort and style you deserve.

title: Instant Swap
content: Change your rental car anytime during your trip with our Instant Swap feature. Whether you need more space or just want a change, visit any branch and swap your car in minutes — hassle-free and at no extra charge.

title: Drive Now, Pay Later
content: With Drive Now, Pay Later, you can rent your car today and choose to pay after your trip ends. Flexible billing options make planning easier, especially for long-term renters or unexpected travel. No hidden fees — just smart renting.

title: Smart Trip Suggestions
content: Our system analyzes your travel details and recommends the best car options with Smart Trip Suggestions. Whether it's a city ride or a mountain getaway, you'll get cars optimized for fuel, comfort, and road type — in one click.

title: Voice-Controlled Dashboard Setup
content: All our premium rentals now come with Voice-Controlled Dashboard Setup. Set your GPS, AC, and favorite radio station using your voice before pickup. Your preferences will be saved across rentals, so every car feels like your own.

title: Eco Track Mode
content: Help the planet while you drive. Eco Track Mode lets you monitor your carbon footprint in real-time, offering tips to drive more efficiently. Choose eco-friendly models and earn Green Points that can be redeemed for future discounts.
